mapper.select: select t.team_id, team_name, creator_id, creation_time, project_id, u2.user_name as creator_name from user u1 inner join team_member tm on u1.user_id = tm.member_id inner join team t on tm.team_id = t.team_id inner join user u2 on u2.user_id =t.creator_id where u1.user_id=#{userId}

select team_id, member_id, r.role_id, role_name,user_name as member_name from team_member inner join user u on team_member.member_id = u.user_id inner join role r on team_member.role_id = r.role_id where team_id=#{teamId}
